DECLARE @constraintName sysname DECLARE @DropConstraintSQL NVARCHAR(MAX) SELECT @constraintName = DC.name FROM sys.columns C JOIN sys.tables T ON (C.object_id = T.object_id) JOIN sys.default_constraints DC ON (DC.parent_column_id = C.column_id AND DC.parent_object_id = T.object_id) WHERE T.name = 'pkey_generator' AND C.name = 'value' SET @DropConstraintSQL = N'ALTER TABLE pkey_generator DROP CONSTRAINT '+ @constraintName EXEC sp_executesql @DropConstraintSQL ALTER TABLE pkey_generator ALTER COLUMN value BIGINT;
ALTER TABLE pkey_generator WITH NOCHECK ADD CONSTRAINT DF_default_value DEFAULT 1 FOR value;
